item.title: ‘Star Wars: A New Hope’ Stormtrooper Helmet Sold for $256,000 at Auction
item.description: A Stormtrooper helmet from “Star Wars: Episode IV – A New Hope” fetched $256,000 at an auction held Sunday at Comic-Con in San Diego. According to Julien’s Auctions and Turner Classi
